txt.en: 'We grow weary. Soon the Gauredain will overtake this outpost.\n\n'The furry worms have encroached upon our outposts. Defeat the creatures and teach them the error of their new boldness.'
'You have defeated some of the ice-worms? The news gives me great pleasure.'
'Track the furry worms and defeat them. They grow bold in the wake of the Gauredain raids.'
The threat of the furry worms has been growing in the wake of the Gauradan raids.
Ice-worms can be found throughout Talvi-mûri.\n\nJyrki has asked you to defeat the furry worms that threaten the Lossoth encampments.
Jyrki is at the hunter's way-post at the northern end of Talvi-mûri.\n\nYou should return to Jyrki with news of your success.
